alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:55PM CDT until June 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fulton County in north central Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sturkie, or near Salem in Fulton County, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salem in Fulton County... Viola... Byron... Sturkie... Flint Springs... Ott... Moko... Salem Airport... Fryatt... Camp... Wheeling... Mitchell... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
